features: HYDRATE, REPAIR, RENEW: The 13-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Conditioner gives damaged, dry and brittle hair a look and feel of silky perfection and radiant shine while leaving it feel detangled

SOFT, SMOOTH & SILKY: This hydrating conditioner helps renew and soften hair by penetrating strands to lock in moisture. The conditioner also helps improve strength and elasticity while creating soft, touchable tresses

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: This powerful, precious blend with cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil helps moisturize and revive strands, giving hair a natural boost. Plus, the citrus-fresh, floral-green and woody scent leaves hair smelling irresistibly good
NON-HARSH, NOURISHING CONDITIONER: Free from parabens, the sulfate-free surfactant haircare system is gentle as it protects hair from styling
BEAUTY PURE & SIMPLE: For a full nourishing routine that'll leave your hair lush, soft and divinely shiny, pair this hydrating conditioner with OGX Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo
body.description: Hydrate, repair and renew dry hair with this argan oil of morocco conditioner Free from parabens and sulfated surfactants, this moisturizing conditioner helps leave tresses feeling silky and smooth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: we approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability - we approach beauty in our own way. Argan Oil of Morocco 13oz Conditioner Indulge your senses and your hair. This renewing formula helps strengthen and soften all at once, smoothing your locks into their silkiest potential. Our collection helps renew your hair, leaving it lush, soft and divinely shiny. Renewing conditioner infused with Argan Oil Helps to restore and strengthen all hair types Leaves hair strong, soft and shiny Helps repair damaged strands Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits Nourish and detangle with this precious blend infused with Argan Oil sourced straight from Morocco. This thick and creamy formula helps to strengthen and smooth to release its silkiest potential. Ingredients A unique, precious blend with argan oil of Moroco helps to penetrate the hair shaft. Discover newly restored strength, shine, softness and seductive silky perfection. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with all hair types. - Dry/Damaged. - Curly. - Thick. - Straight. Regimen For best results, use our entire Argan Oil of Morocco collection to help with every day moisture. After applying conditioner, we recommend using one of our treatments to help moisturize and restore shine to all hair types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super smooth, no issues
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a couple months now, really like the way it makes my hair feel and it’s not over scented either so it’s comfortable to use. Definitely recommend for others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and left my curly hair feeling very soft and manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my boyfriend as his old shampoo and conditioner line has a crappy pump that makes it difficult to get product out past a certain point. He loves it, the bottle allows him to use up every little bit. It smells amazing and leaves his hair so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Defines waves well, but still have frizz
reviews.reviewText: Defines waves well but I still have some frizz related to health issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of this product one of my favorites to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best conditioner I've ever tried
reviews.reviewText: OGX Renewing Argan Oil leaves my hair shiny and full of body. I ran across this conditioner by accident and now it's my only conditioner. Well the only conditioner I use.. I have a shelf of several bottles of conditioners that I've tried a few times and quit using because I didn't get the results i was looking forward to, My teenage daughter picked out this conditioner for herself and she loves it. The bottle was just sitting there in the shower begging me to try it out one day so I did. OGX Renewing Argan Oil is amazing. My hair is fine and very thick. So although I have a lot of hair the fineness of it makes it prone to frizzing and split ends. This stuffs amazing. It leaves my hair very shiny and it doesn't frizz at all. My natural wavy hair calms down and it's easy to style. I use about a tablespoon of conditioner each time, My hair is 2 inches below my shoulder and one tablespoon seams to be enough. I always wait 3 minutes to rinse it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work better than I thought
reviews.reviewText: I go through hair Conditioner faster than the shampoo. Because of that reason I need a sub conditioner to uses up my shampoo before buying a dual pack again.It does give my dry hair the extra moisture it needs to look health my wave to flow. Keeps my hair form knotting itself. Leaves my hair light & not weighing it down.I give it thumb up. Maybe in time I’ll have the soft silky feeling to it. Just not there yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a De-Tangler
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of this and think it makes my hair smooth, but it does not de-tangle.
One of the best conditioner I have used till date, it's best for fine hair like mine, it leaves my Mane so soft and silky, worth every penny, would highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Makes my hair shiny and smooth
reviews.reviewText: Love it, suits my hair very well.
Smells good and you hair will be softer
